ModMetaData.name: Extra Alerts
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some useful alerts, with options to disable ones you don't want. Includes:
- Caravan paused and awaiting instructions - Tainted clothing - Human leather worn by pawn who doesn't like it - Lovers not sharing a bed - Non-lovers sharing a bed - Ascetic has nice bedroom - Bonded animal not assigned to bonded master - Ally downed - Enemy downed - Unroofed electrical buildings that will short circuit in rain, like batteries - heatstroke and hypothermia in colony animals
Safe to add and remove
Translations: Japanese by Proxyer French by DrTCS Russian by Reiquard Portuguese by Milterator Simplified Chinese by 星宫萤雪 (Yukimo_Hoshimiya)
